name: TroubleMaker Memories [ENG]
description:
Welcome to Troublemaker, an Otome game designed by fans for fans, we have designed this game for you to have fun and live an otome experience with the characters of Boruto: Naruto's Next Generations. 

Our game is divided into an interactive prologue so you can learn the basics of the story and the final and complete game, it contains  six episodes planned so far with 5 ROUTES!

Troublemaker Heart: Memories. 

TroubleMaker memories is the first part of the whole game, we've worked it as a beta. The story is about the routes discovering their  feeling for Sarada, in this little special we will know a little of their lives, introducing us to their problems and emotions. Sarada is a girl with whom they have a bond of friendship to a greater or lesser extent. 

Routes worked out:

Boruto Route

Boruto is the first born of the Uzumaki family, a boy with a promising future in baseball, goes through a difficult situation due to an injury at the worst time.  Sarada is his childhood friend and tries to lift his spirits and support him. She had always been a helping hand, he knew her completely. But, he had never seen her as anything more despite the rumors that haunted them.  This moment may bring about a rapprochement that could change their friendly relationship. 

 Discover this beautiful story!

Feelings blossom with just a moment, a glance or a gesture. 

Boruto's route has three unlockable images. 

Mitsuki's Route

Mitsuki meets after school with his study group, but a thunderstorm

storm leaves him alone with Sarada, the best friend of his best friend, Boruto.

Although they have never been alone together before, this is a good occasion to

hit it off.... Or not. The two have known each other for a long time.

This situation can either bring them closer together or distance them from each other for good.

Discover this beautiful story!

Feelings blossom with just a moment, a glance or a little touch.

Mitsuki's Route has three unlockable images. 

Kawaki's Route

Kawaki , an orphan boy who was adopted by the Uzumaki Family has closed himself and there is no way of reassoning with him. His behavior is intolerable and the teachers asign Sarada Uchiha, the best friend of his stepbrother to be his mentor in studies. Basically is his nanny. Although they have been together for

years, they had never spent so much time together. This situation can be strained to the to the point of breaking the small wall between them or strengthen the small bond they had created.

Discover this beautiful story!

Feelings bloom with just a moment, a look or a song.

Kawaki's Route has three unlockable images. 

Inojin's Route

The mysterious person with the "magic hands" who takes care of the school garden is none other than Inojin Yamanaka, a somewhat grumpy and insecure boy who jealously hides his hobbies. But he is discovered by none other than Sarada Uchiha, an old childhood friend with whom he had no relationship... until that day. Their destinies had been separated, but a few flowers and a small secret brought them together again.

Discover this beautiful story!

Feelings bloom with just a moment, a secret or flowers.

Inojin's Route has three unlockable images. 

Shikadai's Route

Shikadai couldn't tell the exact moment it happened. He only knew that his heart was beating fast, just by seeing her in the corridors.

Sarada Uchiha, was someone popular and beautiful. Quite the opposite of what he was, because he was only known to be friends with several of the most popular boys in Konona Gakuen.  As fate played along, he is able to find Sarada alone at last. He was not going to miss this opportunity to look for some flaw in Sarada to extinguish the attraction he felt for her.

Shikadai's Route has three unlockable images.
